Name: RemoveItemListRows
Description: Removes the specified item list rows while the other item list rows are kept. The DET_ID won't change so that the history can be used. The replace values action will delete all rows and add new ones instead.

Name: UpdateDocumentType
Description: Updates the document type of a workflow instance to a new one.

Name: AddRowToItemList
Description: Adds a row to an item list of a different workflow.

Name: GetUrlValue
Description: Returns a part of the url.
